knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r importing datasets}

# Importing dataset with scientific and common chilean name
sp_list <- read_csv(here("clean_databases/intermediate/sp_list.csv")) %>% 
  rename(sc_name = 'nombre_cientifico_SERNAPESCA')

# Importing dataset with scientific and common english name
sp_yield <- read_csv(here("clean_databases/intermediate/sp_cl_DHC.csv"))

# Marching and generating index
sp_index <- sp_list %>% 
  left_join(sp_yield) %>% 
  select(chl_name = especie_SERNAPESCA, sc_name, en_name = species_en) %>% 
  unique()

# Saves species index
write.csv(sp_index,  here("clean_databases/sp_index.csv"), row.names=F)

```
